description: This file defines a React functional component called DataTable that renders a sortable, paginated table with customizable columns and data. It supports features like sorting by column headers and basic pagination controls.

methods.name: DataTable({ columns, data, page = 1, pageSize = 10, total = 0, onPageChange, onSort })
methods.description: React functional component that displays data in a sortable and paginated table.

ctags.signature: ({ columns, data, page = 1, pageSize = 10, total = 0, onPageChange, onSort })
